text: La Chaux-de-Fonds District is one of the six districts of the largely French- speaking canton of Neuchâtel, Switzerland. The district capital is the town of La Chaux-de-Fonds. It has a population of (as of ). == Municipalities == La Chaux-de-Fonds has three municipalities: Coat of arms Municipality Population () Area km²Swiss Federal Statistical Office-Land Use Statistics 2009 data accessed 25 March 2010 La Chaux-de-Fonds 55.66 La Sagne 25.55 Les Planchettes 11.73 Total 92.94 == References ==
